'''Flue''' was a [[Netherese]] shipwright who helped oversee [[Gallery Steamers]] in [[Eileanar]] until its destruction in {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}.
document_data.Activities: Flue served [[Stuckley]] as a high-ranking supervisor on the construction of [[flying ship]]s used in [[Netheril]]. She worked alongside [[Rousselet]], and had [[Apulee]], [[Fourcrow]], [[Gau]], and [[Bruck]] directly managing the work crews.
